TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Thumb extends System.Windows.Controls.Control
.class public auto ansi Thumb extends System.Windows.Controls.Control

summary.span: 表示可以由用户拖动的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that can be dragged by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件可以包含在另一个控件中，如 或 控件，使用户可以更改控件的值。The control can be included in another control, such as a or control, to let the user change the control's value. 也可用于调整控件的大小。The can also be used to resize controls. 例如，窗口角中的 控件可以提供一个位置，用户可以使用鼠标单击鼠标来开始调整大小操作。For example, a control in the corner of a window can provide a location for the user to click with the mouse to start a resize operation. 提供 、 和 事件，以管理与鼠标指针相关联的拖动操作。 provides , and events to manage drag operations associated with the mouse pointer. 当用户按下鼠标左键时， 控件将收到逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，并引发 事件。When the user presses the left mouse button, the control receives logical focus and mouse capture, and the event is raised. 虽然 控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获，但 事件可多次引发，而不会受到限制。While the control has focus and mouse capture, the event can be raised multiple times without limit. 当用户释放鼠标左键时， 控件将失去鼠标捕获并引发 事件。When the user releases the left mouse button, the control loses mouse capture and the event is raised. 事件信息提供位置的更改，但不会重新定位 。The event information provides a change in position, but does not reposition the . 你必须手动更改或重新定位要调整大小的 或任何其他元素，或将其更改为拖动操作的结果。You must manually change or reposition the or any other elements that you want to resize or change as a result of the drag operation. 控件不提供拖放功能。The control does not provide drag-and-drop functionality. 控件可以接收鼠标捕获，但无法接收键盘焦点。A control can receive mouse capture, but cannot receive keyboard focus. 因此，与键盘焦点相对应的 属性设置为 `false`。Therefore, the property that corresponds to keyboard focus is set to `false`. 此值将重写将此属性设置为 `true`的父类 。This value overrides the parent class that sets this property to `true`. 为提供拖动功能，为 、 和 事件提供类处理。To provide drag capability, class handling is provided for the , and events. 有关详细信息，请参阅 、 和 方法。For more information, see the , and methods. 当 是滚动可查看区域（或视区）中的内容的 控件的一部分时， 的大小将反映视区的大小。When a is part of a control that scrolls content in a viewable area, or viewport, the size of the reflects the size of the viewport. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information, see the class. 下图显示作为 控件一部分的 控件。The following illustration shows a control that is part of a control. ![滚动条插图](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "ScrollBar 图")![Scrollbar illustration](~/add/media/scrollbar-illustration.JPG "Scrollbar illustration") ## 自定义 Thumb 控件Customizing the Thumb Control 若要对多个 控件应用相同的属性设置，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认 以使控件具有独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建 的详细信息，请参阅[通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看特定于 的部分和状态，请参阅[Thumb 样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [Thumb Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/thumb-styles-and-templates.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)]

summary.span: 取消对 的拖动操作。

span.span: Cancels a drag operation for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 具有鼠标捕获和逻辑焦点，此方法将删除鼠标捕获并引发 事件。If a has mouse capture and logical focus, this method removes mouse capture and raises a event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragCompleted As DragCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 在 控件失去鼠标捕获时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the control loses mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当释放鼠标左键或调用 方法时，将发生此 事件。This event occurs when the left mouse button is released or when the method is called. 当用户在将鼠标指针悬停在 控件上时按下鼠标左键时， 控件将接收鼠标捕获。The control receives mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 发生 事件时鼠标的位置由上一个 事件的 提供。The position of the mouse when the event occurs is provided by the of the last event. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 事件的事件处理程序分配给 控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖动功能示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#dragcompletedhandler)] [!code-vb[Thumb#DragCompletedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#dragcompletedhandler)]

span.span: Identifies the routed event.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DragDelta As DragDeltaEventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获时，随着鼠标位置更改发生一次或多次。

span.span: Occurs one or more times as the mouse changes position when a control has logical focus and mouse capture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在将鼠标指针悬停在 控件上时按下鼠标左键时， 控件将接收焦点和鼠标捕获。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the control. 当用户释放鼠标左键或调用 方法时， 控件将失去鼠标捕获。The control loses mouse capture when the user releases the left mouse button, or when the method is called. 当鼠标位置在屏幕上移动时，将发生新的 事件。A new event occurs each time the mouse position moves on the screen. 因此，当 控件具有鼠标捕获时，可以多次引发此事件而不会有限制。Therefore, this event can be raised multiple times without a limit when a control has mouse capture. ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 事件的事件处理程序分配给 控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖动功能示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户按下鼠标左键时， 控件接收焦点和鼠标捕获，同时将鼠标指针悬停在 上。The control receives focus and mouse capture when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer over the . ## 路由事件信息Routed Event Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |路由策略Routing strategy|冒泡Bubbling| |委托Delegate|| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将 事件的事件处理程序分配给 控件，以及如何定义事件处理程序。The following example shows how to assign an event handler for the event to a control, and how to define the event handler. 有关完整示例，请参阅[Thumb 拖动功能示例](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042)。For the complete sample, see [Thumb Drag Functionality Sample](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160042). [!code-xaml[Thumb#Thumb](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#thumb)] [!code-csharp[Thumb#DragStartedHandler](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#dragstartedhandler)] [!code-vb[Thumb#DragStartedHandler](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Thumb/VisualBasic/Pane1.xaml.vb#dragstartedhandler)]

value.span: 如果 控件具有焦点和鼠标捕获，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control has focus and mouse capture; otherwise .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 属性更改其值时，将调用 方法。When the property changes its value, the method is called. 从 .NET Framework 版本 3.0 Service Pack 1 开始， 具有受保护的资源库。Starting with the .NET Framework version 3.0 Service Pack 1, has a protected setter. 若要使用此功能，应用程序应面向 .NET Framework 版本3.5。To use this functionality, your application should target the .NET Framework version 3.5. 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现通过将 设置为 `true`来处理 事件。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，此方法还提供 逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，并将 属性设置为 `true`。Also, this method gives the logical focus and mouse capture, and sets the property to `true`. 此实现还会引发 事件。This implementation also raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现通过将 设置为 `true`来处理 事件。This implementation handles the event by setting to `true`. 此外，此方法从 中移除鼠标捕获，并将 属性设置为 `false`。Also, this method removes mouse capture from the , and sets the property to `false`. 此实现还会引发 事件。This implementation also raises the event.

summary.span: 提供用于 事件的类处理。

span.span: Provides class handling for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 具有逻辑焦点和鼠标捕获，则当鼠标移动时，此实现将引发 事件。If the has logical focus and mouse capture, this implementation raises the event when the mouse moves. 在此方案中，通过将 设置为 `true`来处理 事件。In this scenario, the event is handled by setting to `true`.
